Sentencas: The aim of this research study has been to design a Hybrid Power System (HPS) which works with biogas and whose main components are a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC), a Gas microTurbine (GT), and a module of SuperCapacities (SCs).
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: The HPS is the only power source of a rural isolated microgrid.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: Its structure, operating strategy, and controller have been designed considering the following criteria: efficiency, power quality, SOFC lifetime and robustness in stability and performance.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: The HPS structure includes a unique power converter, a 3-Level Neutral Point Clamped (3LNPC) inverter that connects the HPS to the AC microgrid.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: Regarding the selected operating strategy, it consists in regulating the SOFC power output to its rated value.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: Thus, the SCs and the GT must respond to the power demand variations.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: On the other hand, a study of the HPS shows that its dynamic behavior is not linear.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: Therefore, a special attention is put on designing a robust HPS controller.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: The control model is identified and the robust digital controller is designed using the Tracking and Regulation with Independent Objectives method.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid

Sentencas: Simulation and experimental results show how the proposed structure, operating strategy, and controller allow ensuring a good behavior of the HPS from the point of view of the above mentioned four criteria.
Titulo: Design of a SOFC/GT/SCs hybrid power system to supply a rural isolated microgrid
